[
    FullOpeningTag(
        FullOpeningTagStatement {
            span: Span {
                line: 1,
                column: 1,
                position: 0,
            },
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: Nowdoc(
                NowdocExpression {
                    value: "Hello, {$name}!",
                },
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 5,
                    column: 4,
                    position: 35,
                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
